channel.title: PvP problem (z508/525)
channel.description: Okay theres a problem with my pvp where you cant attack anyone, but you can attack them with mage but thats it. So you can't attack anyone with melee nor range. All I know is it has to do something with my player.java, and playercombat.java. But I dont know what to do!

item.title: PvP problem (z508/525)
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

you’re not allowed to offer rewards for help, even if the offer was legit.

Read full topic
